string.value: Mu Young says he's met a strange man. Could it be someone who is related to the impending revival of Balrog? Let's go find Mu Young.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. He has asked you to look into this and see if you can gather some information about the man. Let's investigate the strange man.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. At the request of Mu Young, who has asked you to look into this strange man to see if you can gather some information, you began your investigation.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's start a conversation with the strange man.

Did you seen a strange man on your way down here? I haven't seen a single person around here in ages, and it seems a bit odd that this person suddenly appeared out of nowhere. Isn't that weird? He even had chains around his ankles! I can't stop wondering who this person is. How do you feel about investigating him?
Alright. Could you talk to him and distract him while I investigate? Go on ahead and I'll be right there behind you.
Don't you think he's a bit strange? I'm so curious, I can't stand it!

What a beautiful day it is. I know you and that other man are here to see what you can find out about me, but I'm just a person like you. I have nothing to reveal, so stop wasting your time and energy, and just go back to where you came from.\r\n#b#L0#Who are you?#l\n#k

As you can see, I'm just an ordinary person. Ah, but I do have a special talent. Come back and see me later and I'll show you my trick. It'll be entertaining. I doubt your friend with the hat will come though. Hahaha.
I know a lot about rare treasures.
Start a conversation with that strange man and distract him. I'll be right there behind you.
